Ã¢â‚¬Å“Top Gun 2 is a super fun game, offers plenty of value for the price, and a great game for both kids and adults. 4/5Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Slap App

Ã¢â‚¬Å“Top Gun 2 is a fun arcade-style shooterÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ a cheerful, aggressive shooter with plenty of thrills. Recommended.Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ IGN.com

Top Gun is back with more missions and more excitement! In this fast-paced air combat jet shooter, you must continue to make the world safe from encroaching Communist aggressors. The USS Enterprise has entered enemy waters to rid the area of hostiles, and it is up to you to contain the threat as you embark on a series of intense missions includingÃ¢â‚¬Â¦

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Search & Rescue - Iceman has been shot down behind enemy lines, and itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s up to you to get in there and save him

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Clear the Way - Destroy an enemy airfield for a recon mission

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make the Skies Safe Again - Chase and destroy an enemy ICBM before it reaches the United States

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Bogies Everywhere Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Battle jets, helicopters, tanks, and tough bosses

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ And many more missionsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦


Top Gun 2 continues to push the envelope of action-based gameplay on the iPhone and iPod Touch, including:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ More Jets, More Weapons - Three state-of-the-art combat aircraft to choose from: the F-18 Hornet, the F-16 Fighting Falcon, and the F-14 Tomcat -- each with fully upgradeable cannon and missile systems. Each plane comes equipped with 2 unique special offensive and defensive capabilities, including the devastating Metal Storm, Missile Barrage and Smart Bomb attacks.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Adrenalized Arcade Action - Dynamic level design that keeps players on the edge of their seats with surprise attacks and unique game-flow, enhanced AI capable of multiple attack patterns and evasive maneuvers, and blistering boss battles insure the fastest, most exciting jet fighting combat imaginable.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Seven Unique Theaters of Operations - Air-to-air and air-to-ground combat against enemy armor, helicopters, and fighter jets over all types of terrain -- even outer space -- across 7 different arenas of battle.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Break the Technology Barrier Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Full-screen anti-aliasing, shader effects and enhanced specular and particle effects provide incredibly rich and exciting visual effects and deeply immersive environments.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Powered by Daredevil Squadron - A raucous soundtrack by Brooklyn based rockers Daredevil Squadron as well as the all-time classic track "Danger Zone".
